EmailTemplate.name: APJ_Event_Pivotal Breakfast_Sydney_Q119.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Pivotal Sydney Breakfast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Breakfast - Driving Innovation with Application Transformation.
Date: Wednesday, 27th March 2019 Time: 8:30am - 10:15am (registration opens from 8am) Location: Pivotal Labs Sydney, Level 11/155 Clarence St, Sydney NSW 2000
Save the event in your calendar: https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Pivotal-Breakfast-Sydney-March19.ics
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at communications-apj@pivotal.io.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
